about_the_game:
Add to wishlist and follow cats game if you like cats!


It is a cats game. Play as a kitty or a kitten to become a big pet cat.
Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog. Drop a vase.

Do what usually cats do.

Say meow. Explore the world.

It is a cat adventure simulation.

Survive playing as a cat.

It is an adventure third person game about cats lives.

Add to wishlist and follow cats game if you like pets!

Add to wishlist and follow cats game if you like cats!

Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog. Drop a vase.

Do what usually cats do.

Say meow. Explore the world.

It is a cat adventure simulation.

Survive playing as a cat.

It is an adventure third person game about cats lives.

Add to wishlist and follow cats game if you like pets!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD A8-3870
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM Minimum - NVIDIA GeForce 650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14.6 (Mojave)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB GPU Minimum - GeForce 775M | Radeon HD 6970 | Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: CATS GAME: stray cat, pet kitty, dog simulation adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: It is a cat game where you can control a kitty. Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog, drop the vase. Do what usually cats do. Say meow. Explore the world. It is a cat adventure simulation.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
